about_the_game:
Command your forces and lead your kingdom to victory! Guide your troops through foreboding environments ranging from forests to desert villages to lava infernos. Go head to head with other players in online multiplayer or fight solo in the campaign. Complete all main story missions to unlock Moshpit mode - a free-for-all arcade with a twist.

Gameplay Features:



  • Dynamic weather system
    • Weather conditions will alter the battlefield over time and impact the decisions you make as a commander
  • Command your forces
    • Direct your troops using our innovative navigation selection tool
  • Reactionary Enemy AI
    • The enemy will learn your strategy as the match progresses and will build its own strategy to counter your decisions
  • Craft your strategy
    • Each unit type has its own strengths and weaknesses. Players must chose their units wisely.
  • Upgrade your Army
    • Complete in-game challenges to earn upgrade points. Spend them to unlock new uniforms and upgrade your defenses
  • Build your Army
    • Unlock additional unit types as you progress through the campaign, including cavalry, mages, Giants, and more!

Game Modes:



  • Campaign
    • Battle your way through distant lands with the aide of your community council.
    • Track your in-game performance with Battle Stats to see how you stack up against other players

  • Multiplayer
    • Battle against kingdoms around the world in real-time online multiplayer
    • Rise to the top of the multiplayer leaderboards
    • Small map size for intense combat

  • Mosphpit Mode
    • A fast-paced arcade style free-for-all with whacky weapons and troops
    • Battle legions of skeleton zombies with missile launchers, air strikes, landmines, and grizzly bears at your disposal
    • Unlocked after completion of campaign

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS
  • Processor: Intel 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

name: Fallen Empires

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2047 MB NVIDIA GeForce 760, DX11 Graphics card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Command your forces and lead your kingdom to victory! Guide your troops through foreboding environments ranging from forests to desert villages to lava infernos in this RTS with a twist.
